name: UpdateSecuritySettingsEnterprise
description:
Update security and scanning settings for enterprise repositories.

Use this tool to update the advanced security, secret scanning, and push protection settings for new repositories within an enterprise. Ensure you have admin access to the enterprise and an access token with the `admin:enterprise` scope.

parameters.name: enterprise_identifier
parameters.description: The slug or ID of the enterprise. Accepts the enterprise's slug name or ID for identification.

value_schema.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

parameters.name: enable_dependabot_alerts_for_new_repositories
parameters.description: Set to true to automatically enable Dependabot alerts for new repositories.

value_schema.description: Whether Dependabot alerts are automatically enabled for new repositories. For more information, see "[About Dependabot alerts](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/code-security/dependabot/dependabot-alerts/about-dependabot-alerts)."
